# rrrr_category_theory

Category-theoretic characterization of 4 fundamental endofunctors: recursive F(X)=1+X, differential F(X)=X^X, cyclic F(X)=X→X, algebraic F(X)=X×X

## Installation

```bash
pip install -e .
```

## Usage

```python
from rrrr_category_theory import create_rrrr_category_theory

instance = create_rrrr_category_theory()
instance.run()
```
